sourcesContent:
Редактирование категории
Количество символов меньше 3
import { Component, EventEmitter, Input, Output } from '@angular/core'; import { Router } from '@angular/router'; import { Category } from '../../modal/category.mode'; import { EventEmitterService } from '../event-emitter.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-edit', templateUrl: './edit.component.html', styleUrls: ['./edit.component.css'] }) export class EditComponent { public hideModal: boolean = false; @Input() public categoryEdit: Category = { id: -1, name : '' } constructor() { } editCategory() { } showActive() { console.log(this.categoryEdit) } Close() { this.hideModal = !this.hideModal; } }
